jobs_results.title: Gastroenterologist - Public teaching hospital - Singapore! (BB-D713E)
jobs_results.description: This is an exciting opportunity to experience life in one of the world’s greatest cities! Singapore has a lot to offer including, having a healthcare system that is regarded as one of the best in the world, having a highly rated education system and also being South East Asia's travel hub, servicing flights to (well almost) anywhere! 600 bed teaching hospital with teaching opportunities available New and modern facility with state of the art facilities Excellent quality of life English speaking work environment Performance bonuses are available as well as annual salary increments Generous salary package Relocation assistance offered to foreign nationals Foodie's paradise Access to one of the world's most efficient transport systems A very low tax rate or 12.5-15% – that means more income left over for you to spend! Please note that your day to day work plan will be discussed directly with the Head of the department, during the interview process but please feel free to call me to find... out more about the hospital and opportunity. The main criteria for this post is to find a candidate who is experienced and comfortable in EUS and ERCP. Singapore’s population is highly diverse; with a patient flow of Chinese, Malay, Indian and westerners as regular clientele, cultural appreciation is required. What are we looking for? The hospital is ideally looking for a specialist with one or more of the below: Certification by one of the medical specialty boards of the American Board of Medical Specialties (ABMS) Specialist Certification by the Royal College of Physicians and Surgeons of Canada Fellowship with the Hong Kong Academy or College (FHKAM, FHKAM etc) Certificate of Completion of Training (CCT or CCST) awarded by a competent authority of the UK or Ireland Certification by one of the Royal Colleges in Australia Please note that the career path for a specialist in Singapore follows Associate consultant, Consultant and Senior consultant. We are supporting with hiring of specialists consultant and Senior consultant level for this department. What does Singapore have to offer? Singapore is a bustling cosmopolitan city populated with high-rise buildings and landscape gardens. Brimming with a harmonious blend of culture, cuisine, arts and architecture, Singapore is a dynamic city that’s rich in contrast and colour that embodies the finest of both East and West. There are numerous shopping malls, museums, and dining and entertainment hotspots to choose from. Alternatively, you could choose to discover Singapore’s old world charm. You can explore and experience the island’s key historical landmarks or memorials or you could embark on a heritage trail and enjoy the sights and sounds at various cultural precincts, notably Chinatown, Little India and Kampong Glam. What can Head Medical do for you? Arranging a position overseas is very exciting, but we understand that it can also be daunting and time consuming. We’re the UK's specialist in international medical recruitment and we‘ve helped many doctors relocate since we first started out in 2008 (you can read what people have said about working with us on our testimonials page). We know it’s important to balance career opportunities with lifestyle and we’ll talk through your plans and will get to know you to make sure we find the right role in the right location.Once we have secured a job for you, we’ll manage the Medical Registration and Visa application process, and support you (and your family) with the relocation itself

jobs_results.title: Recruitment Consultant (Internship) #LKC
jobs_results.description:
Have you ever been curious about the hiring process?

Open to learn more about the legal industry?

Interested to know more about networking and establishing connections between firms and talents in the legal industry?

If having a hands-on internship experience is of importance to you, and if you’re an individual willing and keen to learn more about corporate life in Recruit Legal, wait no longer and apply for an internship with us!

What can you take away from us?

· Greater understanding of the legal industry

· Improved interpersonal and communication skills

· How to be resourceful and efficient

· To perform and prioritize under stress

· A real insight into, and personal experience with corporate life – life as a legal recruitment consultant

Responsibilities – of a legal recruiter

1. Recruitment

a. To actively source for potential candidates for different legal placements via many channels

b. Communicating with professionals in the legal industry who hold managerial roles... and above

2. Administrative

a. Posting of job advertisements

b. Updating of documents

Requirements:

· Minimum “A” Level Certification

· Minimum 3 months commitment

Our Preferred Skills:

· Driven and Self-motivated

· Willing to learn; open minded

· Well-versed in MS Office

· Efficient at work

· Outgoing personality

Kate Chang Chu Yan

EA License No.: 16S8107

EA Personnel Registration NO.: R1332479

Recruit Legal is the leading specialist legal recruitment consultancy in Asia. The firm's proven search process and broad industry and regional expertise has enabled successful placements to be made in Singapore, Hong Kong, Beijing, Shanghai and Jakarta. We have very quickly been recognized as one of the leading consultancies in the region, and we count top international law firms and global multinationals as our clients. Beginning as an informal unit in Recruit Express and formalized into an independent legal division in 2003, Recruit Legal has since 1996 provided legal recruitment services to a broad client base. Over the years, our consultants have gained considerable experience in the placement and procurement of mid-level and senior legal professionals. We continue to focus on the core legal markets in Asia-Pacific.

Our goal is to be recognized as the pre-eminent adviser providing a complete range of legal placement and procurement services to legal professionals and clients worldwide. Our focus is to facilitate the success of our business clients whilst enhancing the career opportunities of our candidates. We are committed to ensuring the 'right fit'. Our clients, which include multi-national corporations, international banks and leading international and local law firms, have benefited from our quality advice ranging from current market trends to mid-and high- level developments in the legal industry. We have offices in Singapore, Sydney, Kuala Lumpur and Taiwan, as well as partner network in Hong Kong, Shanghai and Japan. Our global reach ensures that we are poised to assist clients with a global reach, and candidates who wish to relocate overseas

jobs_results.title: Senior Principal Consultant
jobs_results.description: ob Description & RequirementsThe role of the Senior Principal Consultant at JAC is to provide a vital link between both clients and candidates. The job is demanding and diverse and involves using sales, business development, marketing techniques and networking in order to attract positions from companies and then to source suitable, top quality candidates to put forward to fulfil the client's needs.As this is a senior role within the company, the incumbent shall come with a solid track record within the Recruitment industry within our business model of Executive Search with industrial vertical specialisation. Candidates should demonstrate a consistent track record of both securing accounts and successful placements.Responsibilities include; Establish partnerships with and gain true understanding of client and candidate needs, enabling the consultant to successfully place the right candidate with the right client Work closely with clients to gain understanding of and identify needs for... key talent, and support the client in developing proper job descriptions, match candidates to appropriate jobs, and negotiate offer terms and conditions. Take a deeper interest with candidates, not just in utilising appropriate resources in identifying candidates for our clients, but above all listen to and gain understanding of what the candidate is really looking for. Achieve quarterly billing targets and weekly KPI targets Required skills; A record of high achievement in a fast paced environment reflecting a goal oriented mindset. At least 5 years working experience in a recruitment agency. CEI Certification as stipulated by Ministry of Manpower to operate as a certified employment personnel. Interested applicants, you may apply here or email your full resume to us at jacspore@jac-recruitment.sgWe regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified

jobs_results.title: Senior Consultant - Cloud Engineering - SG1
jobs_results.via: via Jobs At Deloitte Southeast Asia - Deloitte
jobs_results.description:
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and community. Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals.

Work you will do

Cloud is transforming the way technology enables the business. It represents a radical shift in how IT services are obtained, used, and managed. Companies are navigating through the various cloud options and deciding between private, public, or a combination across different and dynamic provider ecosystems. Our cloud specialists guide our clients through multi-year journeys from the case for change through implementation across all dimensions of cloud - business alignment, technology architecture and design, cloud... application on-boarding, and transforming their operating model – to help solve our client’s most complex issues with the focus on value creation.

Our practitioners work collaboratively within integrated, cross-functional teams to deliver comprehensive strategies that enable Cloud and Infrastructure transformations. Teamwork is crucial as teams are composed of a diverse group of specialists across multiple disciplines from both within our consulting practice and from our clients, helping drive towards a successful outcome. Our practitioners are expected to own and deliver their respective deliverables while managing different clients and other stakeholders.

In partnership with other leaders in the firm, you will focus on selling and delivering cloud solutions using AWS. As Cloud Architect, you will you will drive the design and delivery of world-class cloud solutions for our clients, providing expertise on cloud infrastructure services including design, build and migrate. This includes taking a lead role in the cloud architecture and engineering practice. You will be challenged to find approaches that enable rapid adoption of new cloud services and drive transformation for our client’s business and IT processes.

• Promote public cloud internally to sales and delivery teams to drive growth.

• Be the go to person for Cloud Network engineering. You should have a deep understanding and hands on experience of services offered on Public Cloud platforms and understand how to configure these services to support the building of complex solutions.

• Support the solution architects, and delivery teams in design, build, configuration, testing and deployment on Public Cloud

• Capture and share best-practice knowledge amongst the Public Cloud solutions architect community

• Build deep relationships with senior technical individuals within customers to enable them to be cloud advocates, and provide advisory around integration of on-premises environments with Public Cloud

• Act as a technical liaison between customers, delivery teams and support.

Enough about us, let's talk about you

If you are someone with:

• The right person will be detailed, highly technical, having 6+ years of current network infrastructure experience, preferably with Cloud integration from on premises networks

• Relevant certification in AWS, Google or Azure is preferred

• Professional certifications in Network would be advantageous

• 5+ years project experience migrating and deploying cloud based solutions (GCP, Azure or AWS)

• 5+ years architecting, implementing and supporting Network for Microsoft Azure or Amazon Web Services or Google Cloud Platform

• Experience with infrastructure as code is a must

• Experience with building, configuring and supporting network infrastructure solutions (on-premises, virtualization, Public Cloud) using both Linux/Unix and Windows with specific recommendations on server, load balancing, HA/DR, & storage architectures

• Technical proficiency including systems experience, strong troubleshooting and problem solving skills, and issue management in a multi-platform environment

• Experience with deploying cloud based solutions and workload migration strategy using tools

• Experience with Enterprise application and database architecture is an advantage

• Demonstrated skills in communication (oral, written, presentation), analysis, problem solving and short term and long term planning

• An appreciation of the consulting lifestyle and ability to travel (both locally and abroad) is a pre-requisite to fit to our short-term and long-term project assignment.

Next Steps

So what are you waiting for? Join the winning team now.

Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified

jobs_results.title: Senior Sustainability Consultant
jobs_results.description:
Our client is a main contractor that has delivered some of Singapore's most iconic construction projects, with plenty more underway.

This is an excellent opportunity for individuals passionate about sustainability to drive sustainable strategies and implement them at a company-wide level.

Responsibilities:
• Implement and communicate environmental and sustainability programs effectively to internal and external stakeholders
• Monitor, measure and report progress of environmental and sustainability programs against corporate and legal requirements
• Analyze existing programs and processes for inefficiencies, define and implement the appropriate economical solutions and ensure continuous improvement
• Research and recommend solutions to reduce water and electricity consumption at various project sites as well as reduction of all forms of pollution
• Research and recommend methods for the usage and/or reduction of recycled and sustainable materials at site to be environmentally... friendly
• Prepare the Key Performance Index for the Green and Gracious award - performance rating on energy, water and waste management at sites and offices
• Promote active and broad participation of volunteers in all areas of the Company’s efforts in sustainability

Value Add of Position
• Ability to analyze and quickly identify root causes and design effective solutions
• Creative and innovative thinking to create a greener organization

Qualifications and Education Requirements
• Education: Bachelor Degree in Environmental Science, Environmental Management, Engineering or Sustainability from a recognized institution
• Experience: Minimum 1 - 3 years of experience in the environmental or sustainability related industry
• Passion for Sustainability in a main contractor setting

Technical Competencies
• Certified Green Mark Professional
• ISO 14001 Environmental Management standard
• BREEAM (Building Research Establishment Environmental Assessment Method) Certified

EA Registration Number: R1878961

Company EA License: 20S0371

Participate in Disaster Recovery activities eg simulation at Disaster Recovery sites.Job Requirement (1) Mandatory Basic Technical Support Services Requirements:a. Must have good communication and interpersonal skill and be able to speak and write English proficiently;b. Must have a customer-centered disposition:i. good listenerii. patientiii. elicit the root cause of the problem through asking the right questionc. Able to communicate well with the technical team.d. Preference will be given to candidate with good knowledge and experience in incident and problem management.e. Must have a CCNA & MCSC Certification In addition to the Linux Certificationf. Have at least Five (5) years' post graduate experience working with PCs and Printers;g. Have at least Five (5) years' post graduate experience using DOS, MS Windows 7, 8 & 10, Windows Server 2012 R2, Red Hat Linux Enterprise Edition 6.2E/ Red Hat Linux 7.2, Mac OS X 10.0/10.1/10.2h. Have at least Five (5) years' post graduate experience working in Microsoft Network environment (Workgroups, Windows Domains and Active Directory).(2) Additional RequirementsIn addition to the Mandatory Basic Technical Support Services Requirements:- Must also have at least Five (5) years' post graduate experience working with PC related hardware, software and other peripherals;- Must have good working knowledge and trouble shooting skills in PC related hardware, software and other peripherals;- Preferably also be proficient in applying and using the following software:(i) Microsoft DOS version 6.2 and above;(ii) Microsoft Windows 10(iii) Windows Server 2012 R2(iv) Red Hat Linux Enterprise Edition 6.2E/ Red Hat Linux 7.2(v) Mac OS X 10.0/10.1/10.2(vi) Attachmate Reflection Emulation Client;(vii) Lotus Notes R9 and above;(viii) Common commercial software packages (including but not limited to)• Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 & above, Chrome and Firefox;• Microsoft Office 2013, 2016,2019 Professional is an advantage;• Microsoft Visual Basic.Net (Visual Basic 2008) and above;• Microsoft Visio 2007 and above;• Microsoft Project 2007 and above;• Adobe Acrobat 9 and above;• Adobe Photoshop CS5 and above;• PowerShell Scripting• Microsoft Windows Scripting- Be able to speak clearly and possess good telephony skills and proficiency in providing onsite and telephone based technical support

jobs_results.title: Senior Consultant, DLP
jobs_results.description:
Ensign is hiring !

Duties and Responsibilities
• Lead the pre-sales, development, integration and advisory of cyber security solution architectures/ design to meet client needs
• Specific focus on DLP-related technologies (Network/Endpoint DLP, Data Classification, with integration of these technologies to SIEM, SOAR, EDR)
• Develop appropriate methodologies, frameworks and approaches to address project objectives and increase security maturity
• Recommend security solutions to clients, using a defensible methodology
• Proactively manage stakeholder communication related to deliverables, risks, changes and dependencies.

Requirements

Possess any of following work experience:
• 3 to 5 years of experience in data protection consultancy in an implementation, or operations role
• 2 to 3 years of experience with enterprise systems and network implementation
• Familiar or keen in consulting, including both internal and client facing experience
• Capable of demonstrating the following:
•... Comfortable with managing ambiguity
• Excellent presentation and briefing skills
• In possession of:
• Professional certifications, such as Microsoft Certified, Red Hat Linux Certified, TOGAF, CISSP, CISM or SANS certifications Bachelors’ degree in a Science, Technology, Engineering or Mathematics (STEM) Discipline

Candidates will need to be able to:
• Be subjected to security investigations and may need to meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information
• More experienced candidates will be considered for more senior roles.

Preferred Skills /Qualities

Preferably possess the following:
• A minimum of 2 years of experience with data security consultancy
• A minimum of 2 years of implementations and design experience with two of the following DLP, CASB, and Data classification tools
• CASB, web proxies, data loss prevention (DLP) solutions, security orchestration & automated response solutions (SOAR) , security information and events management (SIEM) solutions
• It is particularly advantageous to have background in design, implementation and sizing of the above cyber security solutions. It is also advantageous to have 2 years of experience with the following Cloud platforms – AWS, Azure, GCP

jobs_results.title: SAP HR Integration Consultant
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a SAP HR Integration Consultant, who is/are able to fulfill the following requirements:

Duration: 3 Months

Requirements:
- Senior Consultant with Minimum SAP Experience 3-6 Years
- SAP Certification in relevant module is preferred
(In case you aren't, you should be willing to get SAP Certified within 3 months period from project start date. It is a mandatory requirement for this project and GECO offers a special scheme to facilitate this - You can request for More Information.)

Roles and Responsibilities:
- Customer has embarked on a HR transformation program that involves the implementation of SF EC and Compensation modules.
- Number of integrations are required to be built with upstream and downstream systems with the CPI as middleware.
- Design of integrations using SF Integration Centre and CPI
- Build of integrations using flat files/ APIs using IC and CPI
- Writing Technical Specifications documents
- Discussions/ Workshops with users and other stakeholders... for design and build
- Unit testing
- SIT and UAT support
- Deployment to Test and Production systems
- Post go live support

Please send your application to applicants@geco.asia with (JOB_002281) in Subject line and highlighting:
- Your relevant experience
- Current/expected salary
- Availability information
- A latest MS-WORD Resume
